forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 59 overnight. East wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog between 7am and 8am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 72. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 76. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers after 2am. Cloudy, with a low around 56. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers before 7am, then a chance of rain showers and patchy fog. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 71. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
